data.name: Zen: A Gay Sequel Coloring Book
data.detailed_description: The Zen: A Gay Sequel coloring book is a printable PDF featuring 14 coloring pages featuring the ZAGS cast. Color Adam on campus, Jake playing DDR, Tom and Eva at the frat house, or the Lizzes at Q&A!
data.about_the_game: The Zen: A Gay Sequel coloring book is a printable PDF featuring 14 coloring pages featuring the ZAGS cast. Color Adam on campus, Jake playing DDR, Tom and Eva at the frat house, or the Lizzes at Q&A!
data.short_description: A printable PDF featuring 14 different coloring book pages featuring the ZAGS cast.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
